{"id":998471452,"question_id":2,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1689772809,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"43 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/998471452/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.2 MB","code":"\n//  Definition for singly-linked list.\n// struct ListNode{\n//     int val;\n//     ListNode *next;\n//     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n//     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n//     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n// };\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n\n        int c = 0;\n        ListNode newHead(0);\n        ListNode *t = &newHead;\n        while(c || l1 || l2) {\n            c += (l1? l1->val : 0) + (l2? l2->val : 0);\n            t->next = new ListNode(c%10);\n            t = t->next;\n            c /= 10;\n            if(l1) l1 = l1->next;\n            if(l2) l2 = l2->next;\n        }\n        return newHead.next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
